title: [Large-Scale] Metadata-Based Reflection and Evaluation Workshop for Strengthening Teacher Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science curriculum knowledge and lesson design experience
context.additional_context: Learners are instructors responsible for university science curriculum classes, aiming for effective blended learning design, delivery, and evaluation. They can access metadata tagging and visualization tools using personal devices.

learning_goals: When designing 5th-week science lessons, learners can structure explicit/implicit intentions using metadata tagging.
Learners can analyze and reflect on lesson progression patterns through visualization tools.
Based on peer feedback, learners can identify areas for improvement in lesson design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
